message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1750000. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you.  I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial transaction.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product to me, but I believe we can reach a more equitable price. My counteroffer for the product is $1600000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, $1600000 is still below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down to $1650000, but I'm firm on this price.  Let's try to close this deal in this round.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position and respect the value of the product. My counteroffer is $1625000.
